title: Generative AI with LLMs
summary: This course teaches how to build LLM-powered apps, covering prompt engineering, retrieval, and productionization.

title: Getting Started with Mistral
summary: A short course introducing Mistral models, including usage patterns and best practices.

title: Transformer Inference Arithmetic
summary: An explanation of the arithmetic behind transformer inference, with a focus on efficient computation.

title: Transformer Math
summary: A deep dive into the mathematics behind transformer models from EleutherAI.

title: Understanding Transformers (YouTube)
summary: A clear and engaging YouTube video explaining how transformers work.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
summary: Rated 4.9/5 with 4.8M+ learners. Covers Python, NumPy, scikit-learn, decision trees, TensorFlow, and challenging AI projects.

title: NLP with Hugging Face
summary: No prior ML framework experience needed. Learn to use Hugging Face Transformers, Hub, and fine-tune models on custom datasets.

title: Deep Reinforcement Learning
summary: Learn DRL theory and apply it via Colab-based exercises and challenges for hands-on learning.

title: Audio Processing with Transformers
summary: Comprehensive course from fundamentals to advanced applications of audio processing using Transformers.

title: Computer Vision with TensorFlow Specialization
summary: Master TensorFlow for CV: fundamentals, object detection, segmentation, and model interpretation.

title: Prompt Engineering for Vision
summary: Learn advanced techniques for crafting prompts for vision-language models like GPT-4V and Claude.

title: Building Systems with ChatGPT API
summary: Learn to build multi-turn conversations, handle context, and deploy LLM applications in production.

title: Finetuning Large Language Models
summary: Master techniques for fine-tuning LLMs on custom data to improve performance on specific tasks.

title: Langchain for LLM Application Development
summary: Learn to build sophisticated LLM applications using LangChain for chaining, memory, and integrations.

title: Evaluation and Business Metrics for LLMs
summary: Understand how to measure LLM performance, cost, and business impact for informed decisions.

title: Building RAG Applications
summary: Advanced techniques for building RAG systems that combine retrieval with generative AI.

title: Multi-Agent Systems with Claude
summary: Learn to build autonomous agents that can plan, collaborate, and solve complex tasks.

title: Fast Language Models with Ollama
summary: Run large language models locally and offline using Ollama - perfect for privacy-focused applications.

title: Introduction to PyTorch
summary: Complete beginner-friendly introduction to PyTorch, covering tensors, autograd, and neural networks.

title: Advanced PyTorch: Custom Architectures
summary: Build custom neural network architectures and advanced training techniques with PyTorch.

title: TensorFlow for Natural Language Processing
summary: Complete guide to NLP tasks with TensorFlow including text classification and sequence modeling.

title: Attention Is All You Need (Paper)
summary: The original Transformer paper that revolutionized deep learning. A must-read for understanding modern AI.

title: BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers
summary: Foundational paper introducing BERT, which democratized transfer learning for NLP tasks.

title: Large Language Models are Zero-Shot Learners
summary: Explores how LLMs can solve tasks without explicit training through zero-shot prompting.

title: Chain-of-Thought Prompting
summary: Shows how step-by-step prompting dramatically improves LLM reasoning capabilities.

title: The State of Sparsity in Deep Neural Networks
summary: Overview of sparsity techniques to make neural networks more efficient and deployable.

title: Quantization and Optimization for LLMs
summary: Practical guide to making LLMs smaller and faster through quantization techniques.

title: Vector Databases 101
summary: Complete guide to vector databases and their role in modern AI applications.

title: RAG vs Fine-tuning: Understanding Trade-offs
summary: Comprehensive comparison of RAG and fine-tuning approaches for customizing LLMs.

title: FastAPI for Machine Learning
summary: Learn to build high-performance APIs for ML models using FastAPI.

title: MLOps Fundamentals
summary: Complete guide to putting ML models in production with proper monitoring and versioning.

title: Docker for Data Science
summary: Learn containerization to package and deploy data science applications reliably.

title: Kubernetes for ML
summary: Master Kubernetes for deploying and scaling machine learning applications.

title: Data Engineering Fundamentals
summary: Essential skills for building robust data pipelines and managing large-scale data.

title: Time Series Forecasting with TensorFlow
summary: Learn to build RNNs and LSTMs for predicting sequences and time-dependent patterns.

title: Graph Neural Networks Explained
summary: Interactive guide to understanding Graph Neural Networks and their applications.

title: Meta Learning and Few-Shot Learning
summary: Learn how AI systems can learn to learn, adapting quickly to new tasks with minimal data.

title: Causal Inference in ML
summary: Understanding causal relationships in data for better decision-making in ML systems.

title: Model Interpretability and Explainability
summary: Learn techniques to understand and explain what your models are doing and why.

title: Fairness and Bias in Machine Learning
summary: Critical exploration of fairness, bias, and ethical considerations in AI systems.

title: Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning
summary: Learn techniques like federated learning to train models while protecting user privacy.

title: Introduction to Python for Data Science
summary: Perfect starting point for learning Python with a focus on data science applications.

title: Advanced Python for Data Analysis
summary: Master Pandas, NumPy, and advanced Python techniques for complex data analysis.

title: SQL for Data Analysis
summary: Learn SQL from basics to advanced queries for extracting insights from relational databases.

title: Statistics for Data Science
summary: Essential statistical foundations for making data-driven decisions in ML.

title: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning
summary: Beautiful visualization of linear algebra concepts essential for understanding ML algorithms.

title: Calculus for Machine Learning
summary: Master calculus concepts like derivatives and gradient descent used in training neural networks.

title: Bayesian Methods for Machine Learning
summary: Understand Bayesian approaches to ML for modeling uncertainty and making probabilistic predictions.

title: Variational Autoencoders (VAE)
summary: Interactive guide to understanding Variational Autoencoders for generative modeling.

title: Diffusion Models Explained
summary: Deep dive into diffusion models that power modern image generation like DALL-E and Stable Diffusion.

title: GANs: Generative Adversarial Networks
summary: Learn how GANs work through the interplay of generator and discriminator networks.

title: Vision Transformers (ViT)
summary: Understand how transformers revolutionized computer vision beyond NLP applications.

title: Object Detection: YOLO, R-CNN, and Beyond
summary: Master modern object detection algorithms for real-world computer vision applications.

title: Semantic Segmentation Deep Dive
summary: Comprehensive guide to semantic segmentation models and their applications.

title: Recommendation Systems Design
summary: Build scalable recommendation systems using collaborative filtering and deep learning.

title: Natural Language Understanding
summary: Deep dive into NLP fundamentals from tokenization to transformer-based language understanding.

title: Named Entity Recognition (NER)
summary: Learn to extract and classify named entities from text using transformer models.

title: Question Answering Systems
summary: Build systems that understand questions and find accurate answers from documents.

title: Machine Translation Deep Learning
summary: Master sequence-to-sequence models and attention mechanisms for translation tasks.

title: Speech Recognition and Synthesis
summary: Learn speech-to-text and text-to-speech technologies using modern neural networks.

title: Multimodal Learning
summary: Understand models that combine multiple modalities like vision and language (CLIP, GPT-4V).

title: Knowledge Graphs for AI
summary: Build knowledge graphs to represent structured information for intelligent AI systems.

title: Graph Neural Networks: Hands-On
summary: Practical guide to building GNNs with PyTorch Geometric for complex relational data.

title: Active Learning Strategies
summary: Learn how to strategically select which data to label for maximum learning efficiency.

title: Transfer Learning Best Practices
summary: Master strategies for leveraging pre-trained models to solve new problems faster.

title: Batch Normalization and Layer Normalization
summary: Understanding normalization techniques that stabilize and accelerate neural network training.

title: Attention Mechanisms Explained
summary: Comprehensive explanation of various attention mechanisms used in modern deep learning.

title: Positional Encodings in Transformers
summary: Understanding how transformers encode position information for sequence models.

title: Mixture of Experts (MoE)
summary: Learn about Mixture of Experts architectures that enable efficient scaling of large models.

title: Scaling Laws for Neural Networks
summary: Understanding how model performance scales with size, data, and compute - key insights for AI development.

title: The Bitter Lesson
summary: Thought-provoking essay on what has truly mattered in AI research over the past 70 years.

title: Adversarial Robustness in Deep Learning
summary: Understand how to make neural networks robust against adversarial attacks and perturbations.

title: Neural Network Pruning and Distillation
summary: Techniques for making neural networks smaller and faster while maintaining accuracy.

title: Knowledge Distillation in Practice
summary: Learn how to transfer knowledge from large teacher models to smaller student models.

title: Emerging Trends in Foundation Models
summary: Overview of latest developments and trends in large foundation models and their applications.

title: Constitutional AI and AI Alignment
summary: Innovative approach to making AI systems safer and more aligned with human values.

title: Hallucinations in Large Language Models
summary: Understanding why LLMs generate plausible-sounding but false information and mitigation strategies.

title: In-Context Learning in Large Language Models
summary: Understanding how LLMs learn from examples in their context without parameter updates.

title: Prompt Injection Attacks and Defenses
summary: Learn about prompt injection vulnerabilities in LLM applications and how to defend against them.

title: Tool Use in Language Models
summary: How language models can learn to use external tools and APIs to extend their capabilities.

title: Open-Source LLMs: Evaluation and Comparison
summary: Comprehensive comparison of popular open-source models like Llama, Mistral, and Phi.

title: Practical Deep Learning for Coders
summary: Top-down approach to deep learning starting with practical applications before theory.

title: Deep Learning Fundamentals
summary: Foundational course covering neural networks, backpropagation, and deep learning basics.

title: Natural Language Processing Specialization
summary: Complete NLP specialization covering text processing, classification, and sequence models.

title: GANs Specialization
summary: In-depth specialization on GANs covering conditional GANs, StyleGAN, and practical applications.

title: AI for Game Development
summary: Learn to use AI and machine learning for creating intelligent game agents and NPCs.

title: Robotics and Machine Learning
summary: Apply machine learning techniques to robotics for perception, planning, and control.
